Package views.generate_summary_views

Class GenerateSummaryV

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • views.generate_summary_views.GenerateSummaryV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class GenerateSummaryV
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A class that displays and generates the Bar Graph and Pie Chart given the remainder and statistical data. It also has a method to display an error message. Used JFree Chart package for graphing. Code for Bar Graph inspired by this website. Code for Pie Chart inspired by this website.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenerateSummaryV

        public GenerateSummaryV​(GenerateSummaryC controller,
                        SessionStorage session,
                        int monthID)
        Construct the view class and call private method to set up GUI.
        Parameters:
        controller - a GenerateSummaryC controller that will generate the formatted data needed to generate the graphs
        session - a SessionStorage object that contains the data of the current session
        monthID - an int corresponding to the current MonthlyStorage month

    • Method Detail

      • openSummaryView

        public void openSummaryView()
        Creates a new GenerateSummaryV view, containing an empty screen and calls the controller to retrieve the formatted data. Then, it generates a graphical representation of the formatted data associated with the current month and displays them to the user. If an EntityException is caught, it will display an error to the user.

      • generateBarGraph

        private javax.swing.JPanel generateBarGraph​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> statisticalData)
        Generates the Bar Graph.
        Parameters:
        statisticalData - a Map containing all the data needed to plot the graphs
        Returns:
        a JPanel object holding the Bar Graph

      • generatePieChart

        private javax.swing.JPanel generatePieChart​(double remainder,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> statisticalData)
        Generates the Pie Chart.
        Parameters:
        remainder - a double corresponding to the money unspent in this month
        statisticalData - a Map containing all the data needed to plot the graphs
        Returns:
        a JPanel object holding the Pie Chart
